titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities and Exchange Act of 1934 to authorize the Securities and Exchange Commission to pay rewards for information leading to the detection and prosecution of unlawful insider trading and market manipulation, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: 5/21/1987--Introduced. Amends the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to authorize the Securities and Exchange Commission to pay rewards for detecting and bringing to trial any person for violations of such Act relating to unlawful insider trading and market manipulation. Authorizes appropriations for such rewards.
